overview: Lexington Steele is here to present his colorfully vivid and erotic Black Reign series! Lexington Steele directs and stars in this sexual masterpiece. Lexington and some of his buddies take on some of the hottest starlets in the business. Cum check out Katsuni, Vanessa Blue, Victoria Styles, Shari, Ayana Angel, Yasmine Milan, Courtney Devine, Mya Lovely, Angel Eyes and Candy Cane! And remember, the darker the berry, the sweeter the juice! "From Light to Dark...A perfect combination, a perfect representation."
title: Black Reign
